message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm looking for $12000 for it.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I understand its value, but I'm only able to pay up to $10000 for it.
I understand that $10000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I can offer $11000 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $11750. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I've considered your last offer, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $11500 for the product.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11750, but I can do one better. I'll sell the product to you for $11800.
Considering your latest offer, I believe we're getting closer. I'd like to counter with an offer of $11600 for the product.
I'm glad we're so close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $11600, but I'd like to get a bit more for it. I'll sell the product to you for $11900.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose an offer of $11750 for the product.
